title: Water use by volume in Plaquemines Parish

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. Total volume water used in the Belle Chasse and Port Sulphur water districts for the following months:
May, June, July, August, and September 2020
May, June, July, August, and September 2021
May, June, July, August, and September 2022
May, June, July, August, and September 2023

2. All data regarding the 10 largest residential, commercial, and industrial users of water in the agency's West Bank districts since May 01 2023.

3. Venture Global's water use records by volume, indicating how many million gallons per day (MGD) used, or averages if daily volume records are unavailable, since May 01 2023.

4. Zachary Group's water use records by volume, indicating how many million gallons per day (MGD) used, or averages if daily volume records are unavailable, since May 01 2023.

5. All of Plaquemines Parish Water Works' meeting minutes or communications - including but not limited to memos, emails, notes, and analytical reports - regarding:
a. The effects of industrial and commercial users on water supply since 2020,
b. Venture Global's water use,
c. Venture Global's gifts, donations, and/or contributions to the Parish,
d. All communications which include representatives of Venture Global

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Delaney Nolan

title: Dr. McCullough & Amazon (Department of Health and Human Services)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications any employee and any email domain ending with “@amazon.com”--sent or received between September 1, 2023, and September 30, 2023--containing the word or words “McCullough” or “The Courage to Face” or “Leake”.

We request a fee waiver. 
Please contact us with any questions. 
Andrew Block
America First Legal

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

AFL
